      • isPlayerInBlockedRegion

        public boolean isPlayerInBlockedRegion(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)

        isPlayerInBlockedRegion() Documentation.

        This function will check if a player is in a blocked region or not.
        Parameters:
        p - The player to check if they're in a blocked region.
        Returns:
        Boolean True/False. True if the player IS in a blocked region, false otherwise.

      • buildRegionsList

        public void buildRegionsList()

        buildRegionList() Documentation

        The tool used to pre-define the configuration file.
        Rather than loading the configuration multiple times during use. Load the config as a whole when the plugin initiates and only write to it when in use.
        This helps take the stress away from the server when in-use.

      • debuggingLogs

        public void debuggingLogs(java.lang.String log,
                          java.lang.Integer severity)

        debuggingLogs() Documentation

        This is to be used when debugging problems.

        It'll spit out and show you any errors when and where they occur for quick resolution.

        Parameters:
        log - The log will be the String that is sent to the console.
        severity - The severity of the log. 1 is INFO 2 is WARNING 3 is SEVERE

      • sendLogs

        public void sendLogs(java.lang.String error)

        sendLogs Documentation

        Used to sendLogs to a server for me to investigate directly. Address would be *.elmhoe.co.uk/logging/send_logs.php Logs are always sent via POST to the server.
        Parameters:
        error - The string error message to send for investigation.
